description.title: RPC API: check get_block_by_hash
description.purpose:
Checks you can get a block by it's hash number. A contract is deployed and the transaction receipt used to get it's block number. The parent block is returned using the hash from this, and it's block number checked to ensure it is one less than it's child block.
Skipped - see https://github.com/obscuronet/obscuro-internal/issues/959
